snippet: For Mr. Calise, who has been paralyzed from the waist down since 1994, the effort to make New York City’s public spaces more accessible never stops.
abstract: Victor Calise, commissioner for Mayor’s Office for People With Disabilities in New York City, describes his typical Sunday routine.
lead_paragraph: For Mr. Calise, who has been paralyzed from the waist down since 1994, the effort to make New York City’s public spaces more accessible never stops.

headline.print_headline: Soccer and Sauce, All on Wheels
headline.main: How Victor Calise, Disabilities Commissioner, Spends His Sundays
